content: That's really helpful! I think I'll definitely consider some of those parks. You know, speaking of national parks, I just got back from a 10-day road trip to Yellowstone with my family last month. It was a lot of fun, but also a bit chaotic at times. We rented a huge RV and drove from our hometown in California all the way to Wyoming. Do you have any tips on how to keep kids entertained during long road trips?
